item.description:
Apple Picking Outing

Cool fall weather is approaching. Let's take the kids to pick apples one day. We went last year with family and had a fun time.

Right now at Honey Pot Hill: pick your own apples & blueberries, farm store, hedgemaze and farm animals all open daily 9 to 6 daily.

It's peach season, sweet & juicy . . . also in the store apples, nectarines, tomatoes, pears, and vegetables in the store. Cider donuts, caramel apples, apple pie, softserve ice cream and smoothies too!

Cash and check only - ATM in the store

http://www.honeypothill.com/

FAQ

The store is open everyday 9 to 6 til Christmas. Apple picking open everyday 10 to 5 til late October.  

How much does apple picking cost?

The Big Bag, which is 20 lbs. and allows up to five people into the orchard is $23.00 and The Medium Bag, which is 10 lbs. and allows up to three people into the orchard is $15.00.

When is pear picking?

Pear picking is expected to start around September 10 for the 2011 season

How much is the Hedge maze & Tunnel maze?

The cost for the hedgemaze and includes the tunnel maze for children ages 4 thru 10 pre and post season is $1.50 person. Open daily 9-6 thru December 15.

Fall weekends, September and October the cost for the mazes is $3.00 per person.

How much are the hayrides?

Hayrides are $1.00 person, operating weekends and holidays 10 to 5 and weekday hayrides start September 14 from 12 to 4.

Are dogs allowed in the ochard?

Sorry, we cannot allow dogs into the orchard due to sanitation, per board of health.
item.name: Apple Picking at Honey Pot Hill Orchards
